title: Results of Congressional Democrats’ Dangerous Immigration Policies – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Immigration	

Issued on:
June 15, 2018
We must restore integrity and the rule of law at our borders.
						President Donald J. Trump					CONGRESSIONAL DEMOCRATS’ FAMILY SEPARATION POLICY: Too many American families have been permanently separated from loved ones lost to illegal alien crime.OPEN BORDER POLICIES: American communities have suffered from illegal alien crime and illegal drugs flooding our country due to open border policies and immigration enforcement loopholes.
